select distinct actors,film_cats as filmCats ,ft.film_id as filmId , film_length as filmLength , film_name as filmName , film_language as filmType , hfit.img_address as imgAddress from mtime_cinema_t ct RIGHT JOIN mtime_field_t ft on ct.UUID = ft.cinema_id RIGHT JOIN mtime_hall_film_info_t hfit on ft.film_id = hfit.film_id
ct.UUID = #{cinemaId}

select UUID as cinemaId, cinema_name as cinemaName, cinema_phone as cinemaPhone , cinema_address as cinemaAdress, img_address as imgUrl from mtime_cinema_t
UUID = #{cinemaId}

select ft.UUID as hallFieldId, ft.hall_name as hallName ,ft.price as price , hdt.seat_address as seatFile , ot.seats_ids as soldSeats from mtime_field_t ft LEFT JOIN mtime_hall_dict_t hdt on ft.hall_id = hdt.UUID RIGHT JOIN mooc_order_t ot on ot.field_id = ft.UUID
ft.UUID = #{fieldId}
select UUID as areaId, show_name as areaName from mtime_area_dict_t
select UUID as brandId, show_name as brandName from mtime_brand_dict_t
select UUID as halltypeId, show_name as halltypeName from mtime_hall_dict_t
